document.full_text: jpmorgan chase kicked off bank earnings season on wednesday, reporting a first-quarter profit of $5.6 billion, even as problems in its mortgage lending business continued to mount.
document.title: jpmorgan profit rises 67%, but bad loans persist
lines_and_colors: jpmorgan chase kicked off bank earnings season on wednesday, reporting a first-quarter profit of $5.6 billion, even as problems in its mortgage lending business continued to mount.
